com.qtplaf.library.trading.pattern.candle

Class CandlePattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.trading.pattern.Pattern
      • com.qtplaf.library.trading.pattern.candle.CandlePattern
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BigBearish, BigBullish, BigDoji, BigPiercingBullish, BigShadowLower, BigShadowUpper, BigSpinning, MediumDoji, MediumSpinning, SmallDoji, SmallSpinning, VeryBigBearish, VeryBigBullish

    public abstract class CandlePattern
extends Pattern
    Root class of candlestick patterns. To correctly calculate proportions and ranges, it receives the average range (hig-low) and its standard deviation.

    Candle patterns are calculated comparing factors. For instance if the range factor is greater than or equal to big and the body factor is also greater than or equal to big, and the candle is bullish, then it is a big bullish candle.

    The fuzzy control to determine sizes and positions is configured pretty simple, big, medium, smal and top, middle, bottom. For further detail about the position within a segment, the segment factor can be used again through the control.

    Author:
    Miquel Sas
